byline.contributor: Richard C. Paddock reported from Kuala Lumpur, and Choe Sang-Hun from Seoul, South Korea.
byline.original: By RICHARD C. PADDOCK and CHOE SANG-HUN

lead_paragraph: The South Korean government also formally accused North Korea of carrying out the assassination of the half brother of Kim Jong-un.
snippet: The South Korean government also formally accused North Korea of carrying out the assassination of the half brother of Kim Jong-un....

headline.main: Malaysia Seeks to Question 7 in Killing of Kim Jong-nam
headline.print_headline: Police Seek 7 in Killing; North Korea Is Blamed
